Description: Widely used as a reliable way to display prop models in the map. This entity can't be picked up like other item entities when touched or used. For custom items that can be picked up use [item_security](../item_security) with custom model. For item that can be also stored in inventory and add additional effects to carrier use [item_inventory](../item_inventory).

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Target to trigger when the entity is touched or used. Although {{ entname }} can't be picked up like any other item entity, it will still respond to the player's touch and use input.
